creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Virginia Dofflemyer
description: red and gold; wide foot ring; rounded rim edges; interior decorated with rectangular cartouches with landscapes, plants, bird, fish and figures against a patterned ground with gold scrolls and red cloud-like forms with scrolls and key-like designs; exterior has two large cartouches with pairs of figures in landscapes separated by organic scrolls with central red circle with gold gourd (?); center bottom is red with three gold characters inside a hand-drawn rectangle bordered in white
inscription:
Inscription

on underside, in gold: [九谷造 ] (Kutani ware)
title: Charger
